<ProgramListing>

<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===-- X86Disassembler.cpp - Disassembler for x86 and x86&#95;64 -------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This file is part of the X86 Disassembler.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It contains code to translate the data produced by the decoder into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  MCInsts.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The X86 disassembler is a table-driven disassembler for the 16-, 32-, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 64-bit X86 instruction sets.  The main decode sequence for an assembly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction in this disassembler is:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 Read the prefix bytes and determine the attributes of the instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    These attributes, recorded in enum attributeBits</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    (X86DisassemblerDecoderCommon.h), form a bitmask.  The table CONTEXTS&#95;SYM</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    provides a mapping from bitmasks to contexts, which are represented by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    enum InstructionContext (ibid.).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 Read the opcode, and determine what kind of opcode it is.  The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    disassembler distinguishes four kinds of opcodes, which are enumerated in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    OpcodeType (X86DisassemblerDecoderCommon.h): one-byte (0xnn), two-byte</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    (0x0f 0xnn), three-byte-38 (0x0f 56 0xnn), or three-byte-3a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    (0x0f 58 0xnn).  Mandatory prefixes are treated as part of the context.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 3 Depending on the opcode type, look in one of four ClassDecision structures</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    (X86DisassemblerDecoderCommon.h).  Use the opcode class to determine which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    OpcodeDecision (ibid.) to look the opcode in.  Look up the opcode, to get</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    a ModRMDecision (ibid.).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 4 Some instructions, such as escape opcodes or extended opcodes, or even</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    instructions that have ModRM&#42;Reg / ModRM&#42;Mem forms in LLVM, need the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    ModR/M byte to complete decode.  The ModRMDecision&#39;s type is an entry from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    ModRMDecisionType (X86DisassemblerDecoderCommon.h) that indicates if the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    ModR/M byte is required and how to interpret it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 5 After resolving the ModRMDecision, the disassembler has a unique ID</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    of type InstrUID (X86DisassemblerDecoderCommon.h).  Looking this ID up in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    INSTRUCTIONS&#95;SYM yields the name of the instruction and the encodings and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    meanings of its operands.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 6 For each operand, its encoding is an entry from OperandEncoding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    (X86DisassemblerDecoderCommon.h) and its type is an entry from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    OperandType (ibid.).  The encoding indicates how to read it from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    instruction; the type indicates how to interpret the value once it has</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    been read.  For example, a register operand could be stored in the R/M</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    field of the ModR/M byte, the REG field of the ModR/M byte, or added to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    the main opcode.  This is orthogonal from its meaning (an GPR or an XMM</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    register, for instance).  Given this information, the operands can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    extracted and interpreted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 7 As the last step, the disassembler translates the instruction information</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    and operands into a format understandable by the client - in this case, an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    MCInst for use by the MC infrastructure.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The disassembler is broken broadly into two parts: the table emitter that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// emits the instruction decode tables discussed above during compilation, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the disassembler itself.  The table emitter is documented in more detail in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// utils/TableGen/X86DisassemblerEmitter.h.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// X86Disassembler.cpp contains the code responsible for step 7, and for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   invoking the decoder to execute steps 1-6.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// X86DisassemblerDecoderCommon.h contains the definitions needed by both the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   table emitter and the disassembler.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// X86DisassemblerDecoder.h contains the public interface of the decoder,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   factored out into C for possible use by other projects.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// X86DisassemblerDecoder.c contains the source code of the decoder, which is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   responsible for steps 1-6.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/lib/target/x86/mctargetdesc/x86baseinfo-h">MCTargetDesc/X86BaseInfo.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/lib/target/x86/mctargetdesc/x86mctargetdesc-h">MCTargetDesc/X86MCTargetDesc.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Specifies whether a ModR/M byte is needed and (if so) which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction each possible value of the ModR/M byte corresponds to.  Once</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this information is known, we have narrowed down to a single instruction.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Specifies which opcode-&gt;instruction tables to look at given</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a particular context (set of attributes).  Since there are many possible</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// contexts, the decoder first uses CONTEXTS&#95;SYM to determine which context</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// applies given a specific set of attributes.  Hence there are only IC&#95;max</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// entries in this table, rather than 2^(ATTR&#95;max).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/contextdecision"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/contextdecision">ContextDecision</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Consumes all of an instruction&#39;s prefix bytes, and marks the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction as having them.  Also sets the instruction&#39;s default operand,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// address, and other relevant data sizes to report operands correctly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// insn must not be empty.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221" lineLink="#aef1a8136ca4df8d11829c1aa2b708f5d"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#aef1a8136ca4df8d11829c1aa2b708f5d">readPrefixes</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction">InternalInstruction</a> &#42;insn) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/lib/target/x86/mctargetdesc/x86asmbackend-cpp/#ad30c0dba88d2e5f9cc2a9e74fd1e1078">isPrefix</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">byte</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> = 0;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/lib/target/x86/mctargetdesc/x86asmbackend-cpp/#ad30c0dba88d2e5f9cc2a9e74fd1e1078">isPrefix</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we fail reading prefixes, just stop here and let the opcode reader</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// deal with it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a650dea4533083a886cec9f16d80356d9af0ef8c72418989a4bb20243ccb61eeb0">consume</a>(insn, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">byte</span><span class="doxyHighlight">))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the byte is a LOCK/REP/REPNE prefix and not a part of the opcode, then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// break and let it be disassembled as a normal &quot;instruction&quot;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#aa3b2f84ae751780dd417d7d59f235f3f">readerCursor</a> - 1 == insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#a9c4b81107e8000eb718b029773322245">startLocation</a> &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">byte</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> == 0xf0) </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LOCK</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">byte</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> == 242 || </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">byte</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> == 0xf3) &amp;&amp; !<a href="#aef79c7512f86471adf8452b0cf8e2f58">peek</a>(insn, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/lib/target/webassembly/disassembler/webassemblydisassembler-cpp/#a3af3220ede6cc99137a661c057fb4042">nextByte</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the byte is 242 or 0xf3, and any of the following conditions are</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">           ((<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/lib/target/webassembly/disassembler/webassemblydisassembler-cpp/#a3af3220ede6cc99137a661c057fb4042">nextByte</a> &amp; 0xfe) == 134 || (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/lib/target/webassembly/disassembler/webassemblydisassembler-cpp/#a3af3220ede6cc99137a661c057fb4042">nextByte</a> &amp; 0xf8) == 0x90))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">byte</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> == 243 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/lib/target/webassembly/disassembler/webassemblydisassembler-cpp/#a3af3220ede6cc99137a661c057fb4042">nextByte</a> == 0x90)) </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PAUSE instruction support</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Also if the byte is 0xf3, and the following condition is met:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - it is followed by a &quot;mov mem, reg&quot; (opcode 0x88/0x89) or</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/lib/target/webassembly/disassembler/webassemblydisassembler-cpp/#a3af3220ede6cc99137a661c057fb4042">nextByte</a> == 198 || <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/lib/target/webassembly/disassembler/webassemblydisassembler-cpp/#a3af3220ede6cc99137a661c057fb4042">nextByte</a> == 0xc7)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">        insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#a74edea7cfe143661776a30d6767598af">xAcquireRelease</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#aef79c7512f86471adf8452b0cf8e2f58">peek</a>(insn, nnextByte))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">      insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#a8e637fa4393e9c7d4cc2a52147d82893">hasLockPrefix</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0xf2: </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// REPNE/REPNZ</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780" lineLink="#a9a556ad6d7ad3eb7fe546bb644b2ba41"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define GENERIC&#95;FIXUP&#95;FUNC(name, base, prefix)                                 \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">  static uint16&#95;t name(struct InternalInstruction &#42;insn, OperandType type,     \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">                       uint8&#95;t index, uint8&#95;t &#42;valid) &#123;                        \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">    &#42;valid = 1;                                                                \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">    switch (type) &#123;                                                            \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">    default:                                                                   \\</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">      return 0;                                                                \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">    case TYPE&#95;Rv:                                                              \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">      return base + index;                                                     \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">    case TYPE&#95;R8:                                                              \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">      if (insn-&gt;rexPrefix &amp;&amp; index &gt;= 4 &amp;&amp; index &lt;= 7)                         \\</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">    case TYPE&#95;R16:                                                             \\</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">      return prefix##&#95;RAX + index;                                             \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">    case TYPE&#95;ZMM:                                                             \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">      return prefix##&#95;ZMM0 + index;                                            \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">    case TYPE&#95;YMM:                                                             \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">      return prefix##&#95;YMM0 + index;                                            \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">    case TYPE&#95;XMM:                                                             \\</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">    case TYPE&#95;TMM:                                                             \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">      if (index &gt; 7)                                                           \\</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="848"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Consult an operand type to determine the meaning of the reg or R/M field. If</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the operand is an XMM operand, for example, an operand would be XMM0 instead</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of AX, which readModRM() would otherwise misinterpret it as.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// @param insn  - The instruction containing the operand.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// @param type  - The operand type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// @param index - The existing value of the field as reported by readModRM().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// @param valid - The address of a uint8&#95;t.  The target is set to 1 if the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                field is valid for the register class; 0 if not.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// @return      - The proper value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="#a9a556ad6d7ad3eb7fe546bb644b2ba41">GENERIC&#95;FIXUP&#95;FUNC</a>(fixupRegValue, insn-&gt;regBase, MODRM&#95;REG)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="#a9a556ad6d7ad3eb7fe546bb644b2ba41">GENERIC&#95;FIXUP&#95;FUNC</a>(fixupRMValue, insn-&gt;eaRegBase, EA&#95;REG)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Consult an operand specifier to determine which of the fixup&#42;Value functions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to use in correcting readModRM()&#39;ss interpretation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// @param insn  - See fixup&#42;Value().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// @param op    - The operand specifier.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// @return      - 0 if fixup was successful; -1 if the register returned was</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                invalid for its class.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868" lineLink="#adb1fcba65d61d145b053ee0217b3dee7"><span class="doxyHighlight">static </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#adb1fcba65d61d145b053ee0217b3dee7">fixupReg</a>(struct <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction">InternalInstruction</a> &#42;insn,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> struct <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/operandspecifier">OperandSpecifier</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonbittracker-cpp/#a0ee73ba17c3a2cb54752905e99d77357">op</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t valid;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;fixupReg()&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86disassembler/#ab16c22bdc7e0ea6d8639f8ebf70a8956">OperandEncoding</a>)<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonbittracker-cpp/#a0ee73ba17c3a2cb54752905e99d77357">op</a>-&gt;encoding) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"><span class="doxyHighlight">    insn-&gt;vvvv =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"><span class="doxyHighlight">        (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86disassembler/#a1e59b79e1d09149912cad9c0ef2809ad">Reg</a>)fixupRegValue(insn, (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86disassembler/#aab366fca16308a4d6a59305aec58b6f8">OperandType</a>)<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonbittracker-cpp/#a0ee73ba17c3a2cb54752905e99d77357">op</a>-&gt;type, insn-&gt;vvvv, &amp;valid);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   insn-&gt;reg - insn-&gt;regBase, &amp;valid);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!valid)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/x86disassemblerdecodercommon-h/#a3fd192bea7092fa66a95e4ca0cf236fe">CASE&#95;ENCODING&#95;RM</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (insn-&gt;vectorExtensionType == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86disassembler/#a88730ad84a956ffad5205b3b79a93b78afd8e9c8ad31d8d77fbde6adfa808f8d4">TYPE&#95;EVEX</a> &amp;&amp; insn-&gt;mode == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86disassembler/#a2770a7b5455f322436ac3d7723979ab8a0a0a664b4e04945bb7338a796271eaf7">MODE&#95;64BIT</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/lib/target/x86/disassembler/x86disassemblerdecoder-h/#a4bce531c2ed18d569a316029616e82f0">modFromModRM</a>(insn-&gt;modRM) == 3) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// EVEX&#95;X can extend the register id to 32 for a non-GPR register that is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// encoded in RM.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mode : MODE&#95;64&#95;BIT</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  Only 8 vector registers are available in 32 bit mode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mod : 3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  RM encodes a register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonbittracker-cpp/#a0ee73ba17c3a2cb54752905e99d77357">op</a>-&gt;type) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TYPE&#95;Rv:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TYPE&#95;R8:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1358"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a77b7a7d41251f651fae4a8f7cf8b8311">getInstructionIDWithAttrMask</a>(&amp;instructionID, insn, attrMask))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1359"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1360"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1361"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The following clauses compensate for limitations of the tables.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1362"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1363"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#acec6e7f968f004123e55e6b2c04859f7">mode</a> != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86disassembler/#a2770a7b5455f322436ac3d7723979ab8a0a0a664b4e04945bb7338a796271eaf7">MODE&#95;64BIT</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1364"><span class="doxyHighlight">      insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#aec1dd627d95bd0f134d90d538d728cac">vectorExtensionType</a> != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86disassembler/#a88730ad84a956ffad5205b3b79a93b78ab831cfec071b3ebe687235b3ef5b96f9">TYPE&#95;NO&#95;VEX&#95;XOP</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1365"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The tables can&#39;t distinquish between cases where the W-bit is used to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1366"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// select register size and cases where its a required part of the opcode.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1367"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#aec1dd627d95bd0f134d90d538d728cac">vectorExtensionType</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86disassembler/#a88730ad84a956ffad5205b3b79a93b78afd8e9c8ad31d8d77fbde6adfa808f8d4">TYPE&#95;EVEX</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1368"><span class="doxyHighlight">         <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/lib/target/x86/disassembler/x86disassemblerdecoder-h/#aaa9036cb371f65ab0c9aa3d7f2abb5f3">wFromEVEX3of4</a>(insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#a4dfc5f5e7de8a290fb42d12a7e1b26dc">vectorExtensionPrefix</a>&#91;2&#93;)) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1369"><span class="doxyHighlight">        (insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#aec1dd627d95bd0f134d90d538d728cac">vectorExtensionType</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86disassembler/#a88730ad84a956ffad5205b3b79a93b78ad63c6ef1f04c8aa18d74c2700d1f559e">TYPE&#95;VEX&#95;3B</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1370"><span class="doxyHighlight">         <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/lib/target/x86/disassembler/x86disassemblerdecoder-h/#ab11339ee1e5b8aaa4a706693c51041ae">wFromVEX3of3</a>(insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#a4dfc5f5e7de8a290fb42d12a7e1b26dc">vectorExtensionPrefix</a>&#91;2&#93;)) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1371"><span class="doxyHighlight">        (insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#aec1dd627d95bd0f134d90d538d728cac">vectorExtensionType</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86disassembler/#a88730ad84a956ffad5205b3b79a93b78a526cd04f63e6634ccad1e962577e59b8">TYPE&#95;XOP</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1372"><span class="doxyHighlight">         <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/lib/target/x86/disassembler/x86disassemblerdecoder-h/#aea420e27120dd9f790849c9090b42256">wFromXOP3of3</a>(insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#a4dfc5f5e7de8a290fb42d12a7e1b26dc">vectorExtensionPrefix</a>&#91;2&#93;))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1373"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1374"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint16&#95;t instructionIDWithREXW;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1375"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a77b7a7d41251f651fae4a8f7cf8b8311">getInstructionIDWithAttrMask</a>(&amp;instructionIDWithREXW, insn,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1376"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       attrMask | <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86disassembler/#a6417cabaf5514433877aa0592985e761ac4f7746f0e0278f882f6496bc332a0a7">ATTR&#95;REXW</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1377"><span class="doxyHighlight">        insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#acc4b989b9e4750eeb9787809e0159054">instructionID</a> = instructionID;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1378"><span class="doxyHighlight">        insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#aac2dea60075f209cbef6ccf11f9829ba">spec</a> = &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/x86disassemblerdecodercommon-h/#a62a3fc430e98f080dc7e39325d2b9e54">INSTRUCTIONS&#95;SYM</a>&#91;instructionID&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1379"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1380"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1381"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1382"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SpecName = mii-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrinfo/#abdbb44946a6951b5d90dd5313023156f">getName</a>(instructionIDWithREXW);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1383"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If not a 64-bit instruction. Switch the opcode.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1384"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="#a652270ec0bdb03b5a7f934524412aa7f">is64Bit</a>(SpecName.data())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1385"><span class="doxyHighlight">        insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#acc4b989b9e4750eeb9787809e0159054">instructionID</a> = instructionIDWithREXW;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1386"><span class="doxyHighlight">        insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#aac2dea60075f209cbef6ccf11f9829ba">spec</a> = &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/x86disassemblerdecodercommon-h/#a62a3fc430e98f080dc7e39325d2b9e54">INSTRUCTIONS&#95;SYM</a>&#91;instructionIDWithREXW&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1387"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1388"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1389"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1390"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1391"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1392"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Absolute moves, umonitor, and movdir64b need special handling.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1393"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -For 16-bit mode because the meaning of the AdSize and OpSize prefixes are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1394"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  inverted w.r.t.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1395"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -For 32-bit mode we need to ensure the ADSIZE prefix is observed in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1396"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  any position.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1397"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#af87363b191e81d22b3dfa0618628ed3e">opcodeType</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86disassembler/#aaab12f79117070dc035099f1daed2b8eaf9d21d7b85f3134f59025667d1a87901">ONEBYTE</a> &amp;&amp; ((insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#a48eaa97ba6df31c9e0d5b60057b26cb3">opcode</a> &amp; 0xFC) == 0xA0)) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1398"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#af87363b191e81d22b3dfa0618628ed3e">opcodeType</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86disassembler/#aaab12f79117070dc035099f1daed2b8ea4a57a751955088217dbec4ddde73a0d9">TWOBYTE</a> &amp;&amp; (insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#a48eaa97ba6df31c9e0d5b60057b26cb3">opcode</a> == 0xAE)) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1399"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#af87363b191e81d22b3dfa0618628ed3e">opcodeType</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86disassembler/#aaab12f79117070dc035099f1daed2b8ea326a3b9aff421046aeed72135f644612">THREEBYTE&#95;38</a> &amp;&amp; insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#a48eaa97ba6df31c9e0d5b60057b26cb3">opcode</a> == 0xF8) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1400"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#af87363b191e81d22b3dfa0618628ed3e">opcodeType</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86disassembler/#aaab12f79117070dc035099f1daed2b8ea7c46af55213eba7d7104354bf073cbbe">MAP4</a> &amp;&amp; insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#a48eaa97ba6df31c9e0d5b60057b26cb3">opcode</a> == 0xF8)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1401"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure we observed the prefixes in any position.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1402"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#a55cba166daaaf8da5569f173c900d5aa">hasAdSize</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1403"><span class="doxyHighlight">      attrMask |= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86disassembler/#a6417cabaf5514433877aa0592985e761ae76db82f3abbd861fe788a368d902e43">ATTR&#95;ADSIZE</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1404"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#a55fd804164f59f102d9cf3bec2bdec5c">hasOpSize</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1405"><span class="doxyHighlight">      attrMask |= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86disassembler/#a6417cabaf5514433877aa0592985e761a05118adcbdc4f3ebee3866375280e240">ATTR&#95;OPSIZE</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1406"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1407"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In 16-bit, invert the attributes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1408"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#acec6e7f968f004123e55e6b2c04859f7">mode</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86disassembler/#a2770a7b5455f322436ac3d7723979ab8a92735b4f723ce305b1b618c0bafae971">MODE&#95;16BIT</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1409"><span class="doxyHighlight">      attrMask ^= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86disassembler/#a6417cabaf5514433877aa0592985e761ae76db82f3abbd861fe788a368d902e43">ATTR&#95;ADSIZE</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1410"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1411"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The OpSize attribute is only valid with the absolute moves.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1412"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#af87363b191e81d22b3dfa0618628ed3e">opcodeType</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86disassembler/#aaab12f79117070dc035099f1daed2b8eaf9d21d7b85f3134f59025667d1a87901">ONEBYTE</a> &amp;&amp; ((insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#a48eaa97ba6df31c9e0d5b60057b26cb3">opcode</a> &amp; 0xFC) == 0xA0))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1413"><span class="doxyHighlight">        attrMask ^= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86disassembler/#a6417cabaf5514433877aa0592985e761a05118adcbdc4f3ebee3866375280e240">ATTR&#95;OPSIZE</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1414"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1415"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1416"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a77b7a7d41251f651fae4a8f7cf8b8311">getInstructionIDWithAttrMask</a>(&amp;instructionID, insn, attrMask))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1417"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1418"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1419"><span class="doxyHighlight">    insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#acc4b989b9e4750eeb9787809e0159054">instructionID</a> = instructionID;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1420"><span class="doxyHighlight">    insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#aac2dea60075f209cbef6ccf11f9829ba">spec</a> = &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/x86disassemblerdecodercommon-h/#a62a3fc430e98f080dc7e39325d2b9e54">INSTRUCTIONS&#95;SYM</a>&#91;instructionID&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1421"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1422"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1423"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1424"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#acec6e7f968f004123e55e6b2c04859f7">mode</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86disassembler/#a2770a7b5455f322436ac3d7723979ab8a92735b4f723ce305b1b618c0bafae971">MODE&#95;16BIT</a> || insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#a55fd804164f59f102d9cf3bec2bdec5c">hasOpSize</a>) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1425"><span class="doxyHighlight">      !(attrMask &amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86disassembler/#a6417cabaf5514433877aa0592985e761a05118adcbdc4f3ebee3866375280e240">ATTR&#95;OPSIZE</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1426"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The instruction tables make no distinction between instructions that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1427"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// allow OpSize anywhere (i.e., 16-bit operations) and that need it in a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1428"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// particular spot (i.e., many MMX operations). In general we&#39;re</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1429"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// conservative, but in the specific case where OpSize is present but not in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1430"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the right place we check if there&#39;s a 16-bit operation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1431"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/instructionspecifier">InstructionSpecifier</a> &#42;spec;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1432"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint16&#95;t instructionIDWithOpsize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1433"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">llvm::StringRef</a> specName, specWithOpSizeName;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1434"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1435"><span class="doxyHighlight">    spec = &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/x86disassemblerdecodercommon-h/#a62a3fc430e98f080dc7e39325d2b9e54">INSTRUCTIONS&#95;SYM</a>&#91;instructionID&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1436"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1437"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a77b7a7d41251f651fae4a8f7cf8b8311">getInstructionIDWithAttrMask</a>(&amp;instructionIDWithOpsize, insn,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1438"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     attrMask | <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86disassembler/#a6417cabaf5514433877aa0592985e761a05118adcbdc4f3ebee3866375280e240">ATTR&#95;OPSIZE</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1439"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ModRM required with OpSize but not present. Give up and return the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1440"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// version without OpSize set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1441"><span class="doxyHighlight">      insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#acc4b989b9e4750eeb9787809e0159054">instructionID</a> = instructionID;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1442"><span class="doxyHighlight">      insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#aac2dea60075f209cbef6ccf11f9829ba">spec</a> = spec;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1443"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1444"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1445"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1446"><span class="doxyHighlight">    specName = mii-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrinfo/#abdbb44946a6951b5d90dd5313023156f">getName</a>(instructionID);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1447"><span class="doxyHighlight">    specWithOpSizeName = mii-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrinfo/#abdbb44946a6951b5d90dd5313023156f">getName</a>(instructionIDWithOpsize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1448"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1499"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Read an operand from the opcode field of an instruction and interprets it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1500"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// appropriately given the operand width. Handles AddRegFrm instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1501"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1502"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// @param insn  - the instruction whose opcode field is to be read.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1503"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// @param size  - The width (in bytes) of the register being specified.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1504"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                1 means AL and friends, 2 means AX, 4 means EAX, and 8 means</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1505"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                RAX.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1506"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// @return      - 0 on success; nonzero otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1507" lineLink="#ab536506d0058cd6baa803890e9d648dd"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#ab536506d0058cd6baa803890e9d648dd">readOpcodeRegister</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction">InternalInstruction</a> &#42;insn, uint8&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a10f3d955592ae2bc745f57e5b48ae115">size</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1508"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;readOpcodeRegister()&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1509"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1510"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a10f3d955592ae2bc745f57e5b48ae115">size</a> == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1511"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a10f3d955592ae2bc745f57e5b48ae115">size</a> = insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#aa5f56dce77be16a72930ac037453b391">registerSize</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1512"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1513"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> setOpcodeRegister = &#91;&amp;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> base) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1514"><span class="doxyHighlight">    insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#a11bba4757345c8248aa05c3526779d50">opcodeRegister</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1515"><span class="doxyHighlight">        (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86disassembler/#a1e59b79e1d09149912cad9c0ef2809ad">Reg</a>)(base + ((<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/lib/target/x86/disassembler/x86disassemblerdecoder-h/#af112ae874f4cca98ba15a30f5743e5e1">bFromREX</a>(insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#a800a1b50115e92e6d7762fab50cb5fd7">rexPrefix</a>) &lt;&lt; 3) |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1516"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/lib/target/x86/disassembler/x86disassemblerdecoder-h/#a89ead465c9b455052cc64ac9e270f9ec">b2FromREX2</a>(insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#a41d0e9e47665dc38d829804afd7f71e7">rex2ExtensionPrefix</a>&#91;1&#93;) &lt;&lt; 4) |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1517"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      (insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#a48eaa97ba6df31c9e0d5b60057b26cb3">opcode</a> &amp; 7)));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1518"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1519"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1520"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a10f3d955592ae2bc745f57e5b48ae115">size</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1521"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 1:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1522"><span class="doxyHighlight">    setOpcodeRegister(MODRM&#95;REG&#95;AL);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1523"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#a800a1b50115e92e6d7762fab50cb5fd7">rexPrefix</a> &amp;&amp; insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#a11bba4757345c8248aa05c3526779d50">opcodeRegister</a> &gt;= MODRM&#95;REG&#95;AL + 4 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1524"><span class="doxyHighlight">        insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#a11bba4757345c8248aa05c3526779d50">opcodeRegister</a> &lt; MODRM&#95;REG&#95;AL + 0x8) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1525"><span class="doxyHighlight">      insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#a11bba4757345c8248aa05c3526779d50">opcodeRegister</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1526"><span class="doxyHighlight">          (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86disassembler/#a1e59b79e1d09149912cad9c0ef2809ad">Reg</a>)(MODRM&#95;REG&#95;SPL + (insn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#a11bba4757345c8248aa05c3526779d50">opcodeRegister</a> - MODRM&#95;REG&#95;AL - 4));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1527"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1528"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1529"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1530"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 2:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1531"><span class="doxyHighlight">    setOpcodeRegister(MODRM&#95;REG&#95;AX);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1536"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 8:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1538"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1543"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1544"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Consume an immediate operand from an instruction, given the desired operand</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1545"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1546"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1547"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// @param insn  - The instruction whose operand is to be read.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1548"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// @param size  - The width (in bytes) of the operand.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1549"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// @return      - 0 if the immediate was successfully consumed; nonzero</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1550"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1551" lineLink="#a771c0394a5e25fb07aaca2764eff8370"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a771c0394a5e25fb07aaca2764eff8370">readImmediate</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction">InternalInstruction</a> &#42;insn, uint8&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a10f3d955592ae2bc745f57e5b48ae115">size</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1552"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t imm8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1553"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint16&#95;t imm16;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1554"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t imm32;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1555"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t imm64;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1556"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2129"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#undef ENTRY</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2131"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2133"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2134"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// translateRMMemory - Translates a memory operand stored in the Mod and R/M</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   fields of an internal instruction (and possibly its SIB byte) to a memory</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   operand in LLVM&#39;s format, and appends it to an MCInst.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param mcInst       - The MCInst to append to.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2140"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param insn         - The instruction to extract Mod, R/M, and SIB fields</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                       from.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param ForceSIB     - The instruction must use SIB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @return             - 0 on success; nonzero otherwise</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2144" lineLink="#ae82674c41a00b35f36f9ecf81932512e"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#ae82674c41a00b35f36f9ecf81932512e">translateRMMemory</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp;mcInst, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction">InternalInstruction</a> &amp;insn,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2145"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler">MCDisassembler</a> &#42;Dis,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2146"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ForceSIB = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Addresses in an MCInst are represented as five operands:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   1 basereg       (register)  The R/M base, or (if there is a SIB) the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                                SIB base</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   2 scaleamount   (immediate) 1, or (if there is a SIB) the specified</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                                scale amount</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   3 indexreg      (register)  x86&#95;registerNONE, or (if there is a SIB)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                                the index (which is multiplied by the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                                scale amount)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   4 displacement  (immediate) 0, or the displacement if there is one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   5 segmentreg    (register)  x86&#95;registerNONE for now, but could be set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                                if we have segment overrides</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2158"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand">MCOperand</a> baseReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand">MCOperand</a> scaleAmount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand">MCOperand</a> indexReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand">MCOperand</a> displacement;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand">MCOperand</a> segmentReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t pcrel = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2165"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (insn.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#a0f2fd34bb6c71514e8e82cdbd6c1db8b">eaBase</a> == EA&#95;BASE&#95;sib || insn.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#a0f2fd34bb6c71514e8e82cdbd6c1db8b">eaBase</a> == EA&#95;BASE&#95;sib64) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (insn.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#ad0d7a34add9ff161d0c10f219a890bfc">sibBase</a> != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86disassembler/#aaefe05b2150554a84b796b4bca71f706a7cea6ea4847ad1bfdcfa78ec0f2d4a6c">SIB&#95;BASE&#95;NONE</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2168"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (insn.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#ad0d7a34add9ff161d0c10f219a890bfc">sibBase</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2169"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2170"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="#ae0228f36529f75f692753ef96d725012">debug</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unexpected sibBase&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2171"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2172"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define ENTRY(x)                                          \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2173"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">      case SIB&#95;BASE&#95;##x:                                  \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2174"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">        baseReg = MCOperand::createReg(X86::x); break;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2175"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/lib/target/x86/disassembler/x86disassemblerdecoder-h/#a967004f254ec4b0e36dca9b2db27f139">ALL&#95;SIB&#95;BASES</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2176"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#undef ENTRY</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2177"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2178"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2179"><span class="doxyHighlight">      baseReg = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#a46271d9f83558334670c19539bceb965">MCOperand::createReg</a>(X86::NoRegister);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2180"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2181"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (insn.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#aa4e016b484881a9be4576ae14b12481e">sibIndex</a> != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86disassembler/#ae905569d5e7d96d9e1f4150c289660b6a6f17dadc7b55217d06e4a20efeb747ee">SIB&#95;INDEX&#95;NONE</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2183"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (insn.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86disassembler/internalinstruction/#aa4e016b484881a9be4576ae14b12481e">sibIndex</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2187"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define ENTRY(x)                                          \\</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2190"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/lib/target/x86/disassembler/x86disassemblerdecoder-h/#aa49626340dd008810da4c2f48358f4e5">EA&#95;BASES&#95;32BIT</a></span></CodeLine>
